Qingchen disguised as the 2nd daughter to enter the Feng family residence. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)卿尘听闻凤家的女儿手腕上都有一个刺青。莫先生派冥魇用灵力为卿尘探知凤家三女儿，凤鸾飞，手腕上刺青的模样，卿尘以金蝶绘制出一样的刺青，化身凤家失踪的二女儿，进入凤家。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 386
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) A netizen exposes Man Rong's secret of going through plastic surgery and Zi Jun shares that with her talent, she actually does not need surgery to make a mark in society. Man Rong becomes triggered, and tells him that it was his mean comments about her looks that made her decide to go for plastic surgery back then. Zi Jun is taken aback, and he says that he had complimented Man Rong's design talent too, but she had not heard him then. Zi Jun apologizes, and both of them resolve their conflicts. (PG)(重)曼蓉整容的事被网友爆出来，子骏认为以她的实力，根本不用去整容，也能在社会上立足。曼蓉一听火冒三丈，说她是因为子骏当年的毒舌嘲笑才去整容的。子骏愕然，说后来他还称赞曼蓉有设计才华，可是曼蓉没有听到。子骏道歉，两人解开心结。.

programme.desc: Host: Khairudin Saharom, Mastura AhmadThis episode's Ceria Ramadan talks about whether staying at home creates more family tension or a stronger bond. In Ramadan I-U, Rosie is surprised when she finds out that Shah wishes to donate.

programme.title: Ketuk Ketuk Ramadan 2019 - EP 19
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite cooking show Ketuk Ketuk Ramadan is back with more exotic recipes and juicy news. Hosted by Sheila Rusly with a popular invite artiste every week.Among artiste featured are Ayda Jebat, Fendy Bakry, Khai Bahar, Emma Maembong, Nabila Huda, Andi Bernadee, Elly Mazlein, Amelina, Diana Danielle, Faizal Tahir, Aliff Satar, Ariff Bahran, Fatin Afeefa and many more. Episode 19: Alif SatarKari Ikan Bawal - Alif SatarKerabu Ketam - Sheila Rusly In this episode, Sheila Rusly together with her guest artiste Alif Satar travels to Sabah.She will be sharing her special dish called ‘Kerabu Ketam’ while Alif cooks ‘Kari Ikan Bawal’.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 8
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Unknowingly, Raisya found out the truth about Azraf's real plan to marry her.Feeling cheated, she decides to get close to Y just to make Azraf jealous and leave her.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 42
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Kek Champion S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: A fun, quirky and exciting reality baking competition where 12 home bakers battle it out to be the champion. Every episode will have a theme and two main challenges that individual contestants have to take it in their stride and figure out how to emerge as champion. Communication is key this episode as the bakers team up in their surprise challenge, and work together to create a festive cake. Who will be awarded the red apron this week?

programme.title: Ti Amo, Sweetheart 100 Hari! - EP 3
programme.desc: A reconciliaton between a woman searching for his missing husband who has taken their child away from her and their reconciliation as they stay together for 100 days trial period for the sake of their child. Iskandar realized he has done injustice to Malissa and ask her to give him 100 days trial for them to save their marriage. However, Malissa is worried when she recalls back the day when she was chased out from Iskandar’s house. Fendi pleas Melissa to forgive him and Iskandar. Malissa panic when Deena goes missing after school. Iskandar gets jealous when he sees Malissa talking with Faliq.

programme.title: 7 Hari - EP 8
programme.desc: 10 years after Shahrils disappearance in a plane crash, Kamilah has ready to move on and accepts Adams proposal. 7 days before their marriage, Adam meets Shahril. Shahril wants to look for his family but Adam says he is of no help. Kamilah finds out that Adam is keeping her from meeting Shahril.

programme.title: Time to Ride
programme.desc: Pressure mounts for Danny as he prepares for the big shoot with ambitious new tricks and a custom built set. In the six months leading up to the film shoot, Danny rides almost every day in the space, though it's still under construction by the ever-growing team. It's the biggest creative and physical challenge of his life, but he's energized to take it on.

programme.title: Fuse
programme.sub-title: The History of Belgium's Premier Techno Club
programme.desc: At Fuse, a nightclub in Brussels, Belgium, everyone has the same unwritten purpose: enjoying techno music. Fuse is a nightclub in Brussels, Belgium where people can indulge their passion for techno freely, without having to think about the way they behave, dress or dance. Everyone in there has the same unwritten purpose: enjoying the music.

programme.title: Going In
programme.sub-title: An up-close look at Trek’s MTB athletes
programme.desc: This is the story of what it takes to compete at the highest level of professional mountain bike racing. Get up close and personal with Trek’s MTB athletes as they experience the highs and lows of training, racing and living for the sport they love.

programme.title: Play and practice
programme.desc: Jump into the action of day one of the US Open in California with Kanoa Igarashi. Jump into the action of day one of the US Open in California with Kanoa Igarashi. Then it's off to the wave pool to play and practice before the next big event.

programme.title: Keeping up with Kanoa
programme.desc: Following his win in Bali, surfer Kanoa Igarashi takes the energy of success to Margaret River, Australia. Following his win at the 2019 Corona Bali Protected, Japanese-American surfer Kanoa Igarashi tries to harness the momentum at Margaret River, Western Australia. But things don’t exactly go as planned.

programme.title: Kilimanjaro Free Fall
programme.desc: Follow Valery Rozov in his attempt to be the first person to BASE jump off the summit of Mt Kilimanjaro. BASE jumping legend Valery Rozov has flown off the highest points of three continents and now has his sights set on Africa's Mt Kilimanjaro, 5,460m above sea level. Many have climbed the giant, but he wants to be the first to jump off it.

programme.title: Frozen Falls
programme.desc: Will Gadd takes ice climbing to new heights as the first person to ascend North America’s Niagara Falls. Professional climber and one of National Geographic’s Adventurers of the Year, Will Gadd takes ice climbing to new heights as the first person to ascend the frozen sections of the world’s largest flowing waterfall at North America’s Niagara Falls.

programme.title: The KTM shock factor
programme.desc: The KTM team is back at it in the first few days in Saudi Arabia for the 2020 Dakar Rally. It's the first days in Saudi Arabia for the 2020 Dakar Rally. The KTM team is back at it and it seems there's something feeling quite ticklish on Sam Sunderland's bike. What's that? We'll let you discover.

programme.title: Engine trouble
programme.desc: In the latest Rally Raid vlog from Dakar, the Red Bull crew work all night to replace an engine. Check out the latest Rally Raid vlog as the Red Bull crew work through the night to do a complete engine swap of Cyril Despres and Mike Horn's OT3.

programme.title: A tragic loss
programme.desc: The bivouac is in shock at the tragic death of motorcycle rider Paulo Gonçalves on stage 7 of the Dakar Rally. The bivouac is in shock at the death of motorcycle rider Paulo Gonçalves on stage 7. Toby Price, one of the first riders at the scene of the crash, pays tribute and explains the decision to keep racing.

programme.title: Meet the Air Force
programme.desc: The Red Bull Air Force suit up at the Flying Crown Ranch for four days of intensive airborne training. Miles Daisher, Jon Devore, and the rest of the Red Bull Air Force suit up at the Flying Crown Ranch to push the limits of human flight, while Kirby Chambliss and his Zivko Edge 540 aerobatic plane pierce through a 12-man wingsuit formation.

programme.title: Foam Pits and Fishing
programme.desc: In California, Brandon Semenuk and Logan Peat test out an indoor skate training course – including a foam pit. MTB riders Brandon Semenuk and Logan Peat head down to Tehachapi, California to test out the foam training facility at Woodward West. Afterward, they hit the outdoors for some freshwater fishing and skeet shooting.

programme.title: Away Days
programme.desc: Showcasing their superstar team, Adidas present a skateboarding saga, which was three years in the making. The first full-length skate film from Adidas is an epic saga of life on the road. With a team featuring Mark Gonzales, Dennis Busenitz, Silas Baxter-Neal, Alec Majerus and more, this crew bring next-level skating to more than 100 cities worldwide.

programme.title: Imagine
programme.desc: These are the stories about athletes exploring their passions while honouring the power of nature. Pushing limits isn’t about rolling the dice, but exploring the unknown while honouring the power of nature. These are the stories of extraordinary athletes who follow their passions to incredible new frontiers of imagination and self-discovery.

programme.title: Bizkaia: The making of Mundaka
programme.desc: Natxo González explores the traditional sports that helped build the passion of Basque athletes. Up-and-coming big wave surfer Natxo González explores the Bizkaia region of his native Basque Country, home to one of the best left-hand waves in the world.

programme.title: Going the extra mile
programme.desc: Scotty James is riding high after going a historic five for five in competitions so far. Scotty James is riding high after going a historic five for five in competitions so far and is looking to stay undefeated among the stacked field of competitors.

programme.title: The pursuit of perfection
programme.desc: After a crash in the Burton US Open semi-finals, Scotty James looks to bounce back to the top of the podium. After a big crash in the semi-finals of the Burton US Open, Scotty James looks to bounce back to the top of the podium to go six for six and cap off his dream undefeated season.

programme.title: Home BASE
programme.desc: Miles Daisher jumps off the legendary Perrine Bridge to set the record for most BASE jumps by a living person. Miles Daisher returns home to Twin Falls, Idaho to make history. Jumping from the legendary Perrine Bridge, he's out to set a new record for the most BASE jumps by a living person...before landing in Snake Water Canyon...on a wakeboard.

programme.title: MtXRW: Going Down Slow
programme.desc: Mike Swanson leads a tricky formation of wingsuit flyers and a canopy skydiver in the Swiss Alps. Over the alpine wonderland of Lauterbrunnen, Switzerland, Red Bull Air Force member Mike Swanson leads a tricky XRW (cross-relative work) formation flight of wingsuit flyers and a canopy skydiver.

programme.title: Xixo's journey from hobby player to pro
programme.desc: Sebastian ‘Xixo’ Bentert’s fear of boredom led to him to finding escape in the gaming world. Sebastian ‘Xixo’ Bentert’s fear of boredom led to him to finding escape in the gaming world. Little did he know, but his hobby soon sparked his journey to becoming a top professional Hearthstone player.
